bibl.title: Coptic Monasteries. Egypt's Monastic Art and Architecture. With a Historical Overview by Tim VIVIAN.

bibl.seg: GABRA Gawdat, Coptic Monasteries. Egypt's Monastic Art and Architecture. With a Historical Overview by Tim VIVIAN.
Cairo - New York, The American University in Cairo Press, 2002, 8°, xv-142 pp., 1 carte, plans et 16 pll. coul. ISBN 977-424-691-8. $29.50.

Introduction. - Chronology. - The Coptic Orthodox Church (T.V.). - The Monasteries of Wadi al-Natrun. - The Monastery of the Archangel in al-Faiyum. - The Monasteries of the Eastern Desert. - The Monasteries of Sohag. - The Monasteries of Aswan. Ruined Monasteries. - Bibliography. Glossary. Index.
C.R. par Youhanna Nessim Youssef, Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 42 (2003) pp. 168-170.
